course_description: This course introduces the history of the peoples of Africa. It begins with African civilizations in ancient times and runs through the 1880s, when the African continent was divided into European colonies. It concentrates on people and civilizations indigenous to Africa.
sections: Class Nbr: 3691, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 4-5:15p, Instructor: M. Candido, Status: Open
